descriptionMdByRank.1: Increases the DMG Bonus of all Resonance Attributes by **12%**. When Resonance Skill hits a target, increases ATK by **12%**, stacking up to 2. This effect lasts for 5s. When the equipped character is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional **12%**.
descriptionMdByRank.2: Increases the DMG Bonus of all Resonance Attributes by **15%**. When Resonance Skill hits a target, increases ATK by **15%**, stacking up to 2. This effect lasts for 5s. When the equipped character is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional **15%**.
descriptionMdByRank.3: Increases the DMG Bonus of all Resonance Attributes by **18%**. When Resonance Skill hits a target, increases ATK by **18%**, stacking up to 2. This effect lasts for 5s. When the equipped character is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional **18%**.
descriptionMdByRank.4: Increases the DMG Bonus of all Resonance Attributes by **21%**. When Resonance Skill hits a target, increases ATK by **21%**, stacking up to 2. This effect lasts for 5s. When the equipped character is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional **21%**.
descriptionMdByRank.5: Increases the DMG Bonus of all Resonance Attributes by **24%**. When Resonance Skill hits a target, increases ATK by **24%**, stacking up to 2. This effect lasts for 5s. When the equipped character is not on the field, increases their ATK by an additional **24%**.
